==Leisurely Pastime==
The arena is found at the [[File:Icon Akitsu Kimodameshi Leisurely Pastime.png|25px]] icon on the map.
{{Description|The Akitsu Yuugei grounds located next to the "Test of Courage."<br>Players can initiate a game of Akitsu Yuugei of normal difficulty via the bulletin board.<br>Unfathomably, this classical game seems to possess a flair of originality and challenge, instilling it with high replayability.}}

==Modifiers==
{{Transclude|Akitsu Kimodameshi|Modifiers}}

==Trials==
===Crunchy Sakura Mochi===
{{Description|An Electro brick-themed Akitsu Yuugei challenge. The spread of purple bricks makes the layout resemble neatly-sliced Sakura Mochi. From the crackling sound when you shatter the bricks, you can just imagine this to be one tasty pastry!}}
Complete "[[Akitsu Yuugei]]" to unlock.
